thread.section_title: Grange Rochester Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel, great location - Review of Grange Rochester Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Deborah W
title: Lovely hotel, great location
text:
Just returned from a weekend trip to London, chose the Grange Rochester for its location and price. Received a great welcome and we were delighted to be offered an upgrade. The room was spacious and quiet with a lovely view over Vincent Square. Had read some of the reviews and though yes, the d√©cor may be a little dated the hotel is clean and comfortable, staff were all very helpful.
Would highly recommend this hotel and will be checking out its availability on our next trip to London.
